title: Seedhe Maut - Lunch Break India Tour 2024
subtitle: Still On A Lunch Break!
location: Bengaluru
description:
Catch the 'best in the business' in a city near you! Seedhe Maut are taking their hit mixtape on a massive 12-city pan-India tour. The dynamic duo, known for their explosive live performances, will be playing an extended set and will feature several special guests as well as a few surprises! Get your tickets now! 

Having mastered the art of delivering razor-sharp rhymes - this Delhi-based duo comprising Encore ABJ and Calm has used their lyrical dexterity to push forward the boundaries of Hip-Hop in India. Presenting Hindi Rap in a revolutionary new format, Seedhe Maut is taking the industry by storm and is unanimously regarded as the next big thing to break in the rapidly growing subculture landscape.

Age Restriction: 16+

title: Shreya Ghoshal “All Hearts Tour" - Bengaluru
subtitle: By Superhits 93.5 RED FM
location: Bellandur, Outer Ring Road, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560103, India
description:
Superhits 93.5 RED FM brings Shreya Ghoshal, All hearts tour Bengaluru RED LIVE
in Concert Co-presented by Kalaluha.
Let's experience the magic of Shreya Ghoshal's All Hearts Tour in Namma
Bengaluru. Prepare to be captivated by the mesmerizing blend of Shreya Ghoshal's
soulful voice and magnetic stage presence, accompanied by a talented band that
infuses energy and finesse into every performance.

title: Ridiculous - Stand Up Comedy Show
location: 178, 5th Main Rd, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar
description: About the show: Prepare yourself for an unforgettable evening of laughter as "Ridiculous" takes center stage with four of the wittiest stand-up comedians hailing from the vibrant city of Bangalore. Join us for a comedy extravaganza that blends the city`s tech-savvy charm, cultural quirks, and the unique flavor of everyday life. Ridiculous promises an evening filled with relatable humor delivered with the unique comedic flair that sets Bangalore`s stand-up comedy scene apart.

title: SCC SkyCinema - Baby's Day Out
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description:
"I'm telling you. That kid is a genius." - Baby's Day Out 

Get ready for a heartwarming journey into the world of pure innocence as Sunset Cinema Club presents this family comedy classic at Forum South Bangalore Mall. Join us for an evening filled with giggles, mischief, and the delightful escapades of Baby Bink under the sunlit sky. 

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bangalore Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - About Time
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 82/2, Gantiganahalli, Bengaluru
description:
"I am going to live every day as if it's the last day of my life." - About Time

Prepare for an extraordinary evening under the stars as Sunset Cinema Club invites you to the screening of this heartwarming and time-bending film. Join us for a cinematic journey that explores love, laughter, and the magic found in the most ordinary moments at Garden City Beer Collective (GCBC). 

Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied with delicious munchies and drinks!

title: SCC - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description:
"""Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times if one only remembers to turn on the light."" - Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

Embark on a journey with Harry, Ron, Hermione, and the entire Hogwarts cast in the third installment of the beloved series. Sunset Cinema Club invites you for an evening filled with mysterious encounters, daring adventures, and the unveiling of secrets that will keep you on the edge of your seat at Forum South Bangalore Mall. 

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bangalore Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to a delightful romantic comedy that follows the quirky love story of Nikhil and Meeta at Garden City Beer Collective (GCBC). With its refreshing storyline and endearing performances, this movie is sure to leave you smiling.

title: Church Street Gaming by The Boardgame Den
location: Pavilion Mall, 62/63, Church St, Haridevpur, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Detox from technology, interact with people, and have a blast! We have games from around the world that will get you hooked. Chill out with a light fun game or indulge in a rapt Euro one. Boardgames are for everyone! We have been collecting international board games for the last 15 years. We gather every weekend to play these games. Anyone over the age of 14 is welcome! You can come by yourself or in a group and don't worry about not knowing how to play them. We will help you find a suitable game, gather players, and teach you the rules. The events are conducted inside the WeWork Pavillion, which is on Church Street, in between the Metro Station and Starbucks. It is the Purva building right opposite Matteo Coffee. PS: We charge a flat entry fee for the entire event and don't charge additionally per game or by the hour. Once you are in, feel free to play as many games as you like until close.

title: Gautham Govindan LIVE
location: 18th Main Road, 138/B, 5th Cross Rd, behind Cafe Coffee Day, KHB Colony, 5th Block, Koramangala
description: With over 20+million views on Instagram and Youtube, Gautham Govindan brings to you his first solo show. Gautham Govindan also brings to you this description which he’s having a tough time writing. All he can guarantee is an hour of laughs with material honed over the last 2 years. I’ll see you - I mean - He’ll see you there.

title: Classic Rock
subtitle: Ft. Sid And The Difference
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Catch Sid and the Difference playing live on 11th April i.e.Thursday, 8:30 pm onwards only at Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru.
⚡️Join us for an evening full of great music, lip-smacking food & refreshing cocktails.

title: Tribute to MLTR & Backstreet Boys
subtitle: Ft The Showcase (From Mizoram)
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Everybody knows and loves the Backstreet Boys & MLTR ... and we mean EVERYBOOOOOOODY.

We know you grew up listening to them, you might have had their posters on your college dorm rooms, and you`ve performed "I Want It That Way" on karaoke nights. If this was you, we promise to rock your body right (did you sing that last part? Yeah, you did!)

`If Blues had a baby, they would name it Rock `N` Roll,` That is the funda the band believes in and that`s what they are planning to bring to Hard Rock Cafe, as a tribute to Michael Learns To Rock (MLTR) and Backstreet Boys,

That`s right, all your favorite songs by rockstars from the SHOWCASE band will be performed, accompanied by delicious drinks and food.

See you there! Reserve your spots now !!!!!

title: Rock and Roll
subtitle: Ft. Six Blade Knife
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Catch Six Blade Knife band playing live on 18th April i.e.Thursday, 7pm onwards only at Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru.
⚡️Join us for an evening full of great music, lip-smacking food & refreshing cocktails.

title: Tribute to Pink Floyd
subtitle: Ft Retro Legendar Act (Pune)
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Mark your calendars for a Pink Floyd tribute happening at Hard Rock Cafe, Bengaluru on April 20.

Pink Floyd was the pioneer of psychedelic music and one of the biggest selling acts ever on the planet. The group acquired a sensational reputation by performing sound & light shows and built a cult following that continues to grow even after years of the bands breaking up.

Know about your band

Retro Legendary Act (RLA) band has been playing for several years and has made a name for themselves by tapping the primal essence and drama of music. Persevering beyond the mere three-chord progression, this smokin` combo rips through Rockin`, Jumpin`, Swingin` tunes from the 70s to their latest originals.

title: Classic Rock
subtitle: Dimensions
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description:
Dimensions, a band that performs in various genres, was formed by rock renegades from Bangalore. With nearly 40 years of live music experience between the members of the band, the band`s primary focus is to re-create and offer the best live musical experiences to its audiences.
Be there to see them live at your favorite Hard Rock Cafe Bengaluru location.
Timings: 8:30 pm onwards.

title: Rock Around The World
subtitle: Ft Adhir Punja Project
location: 40-3, St Mark's Rd, Srinivas Nagar, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar
description: Experience the magic of live music with Adhir`s captivating performance on Saturday, April 27th, starting from 9:00 PM onwards at Hard Rock cafe, Bengaluru. Let the talented artist serenade you with soulful melodies and mesmerizing tunes throughout the evening. Join us for an unforgettable musical journey that will leave you enchanted. Don`t miss this opportunity to immerse yourself in the perfect blend of rhythm and melody.

title: Tribute to KK
subtitle: Ft. 3 Shots Bourbon
location: Unit G 25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall, International Tech Park, Pattandur Agrahara, Whitefield
description:
Why sing alone when you can sing with the incredibly talented 3 SHOTS BOURBON at Hard Rock Cafe as we celebrate his music in honor of him?
It will be a once-in-a-lifetime encounter that will leave you with enduring memories when the band performs your favorite tunes.
Join us for a night of live music, delicious cuisine, and cool cocktails.

title: Brews of Bangalore by BuzzinUp
subtitle: Bangalore's first ever beer and coffee festival
location: Sangeetha Sabha, 4th Cross Rd, 8th cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar
description: A Multi-Brand Beer & Coffee Extravaganza" presented by BuzzinUp promises to be Bangalore's ultimate celebration of everyone's favorite beverages - beer & coffee. Set against the scenic backdrop of the lawns of Indiranagar Club on the 28th of April, this event offers beer & coffee aficionados a full-day beer symposium filled with chugs, beer games, delicious food, and entertainment. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to indulge in the finest brews from various brands while enjoying a vibrant atmosphere of fun and camaraderie. Whether you're a seasoned beer enthusiast or simply enjoy the occasional pint, "Beers of Bangalore" is the place to be for an unforgettable beer and coffee experience.

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Whitefield Main Rd, Thigalarapalya, Krishnarajapura
description:
"Kuch kuch hota hai, Anjali, tum nahi samjhogi." - Kuch Kuch Hota Hai

Sunset Cinema Club invites you to join us for a captivating evening as we revisit the iconic romance that has captured hearts for generations. Relive the magic of love, friendship, and unforgettable moments at Nexus Shantiniketan. 

Located in the heart of Whitefield, this bustling mall transforms into a haven of relaxation and entertainment as the sun sets the stars begin to emerge, and your movie screening begins. Enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound, as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses, in the great outdoors.

location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura

Hello Music Enthusiasts! JINGLE LAND is here!
Experience the electrifying atmosphere of a musical extravaganza as diverse bands unite on one stage. Vibrant melodies fill the air, ranging from soulful ballads to heart-pounding rhythms. Enthusiastic crowds sway in harmony, immersed in the pulsating energy of live performances. Each band will bring its unique flair, captivating audiences with its raw talent and infectious passion.

description: Swati is funny and almost biting in her humour. Watch her talk about her life choices, stupid decision making and people she comes across with, the lucky ones who made it to her jokes list!

title: Soel LIVE
subtitle: Experience an evening of transcendence
location: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, Ambalipura, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560102
description: Immerse yourself in the otherworldly yet strangely familiar melodies of SOEL, a composer unparalleled in their ability to evoke emotions beyond comprehension. Get ready to groove and headbang to the beats in an electrifying atmosphere that'll make your soul dance! With incredible DJs spinning tracks all night long, you won't have a dull moment. Here's a call to all the party people to come together, party hard, and make memories that'll last a lifetime!

title: The Groove Lab
subtitle: Dive deep into the techno abyss
location: 26/1, Rooftop, World Trade Center, Dr Rajkumar Rd, Malleshwaram
description: Join the sonic adventure on 13th April at High Ultra Lounge. Elevate your senses with beats that transcend boundaries.

title: Texture & Tales
subtitle: Unique and hands-on creative experience
location: Ground Floor No 4AM, 501, Khata No 227, HRBR Layout 2nd Block, Kalyan Nagar
description:
The Texture Art Experience is a unique and hands-on creative experience where participants explore the artistic possibilities of different mediums to craft textured masterpieces. This workshop invites individuals to experiment with various techniques, such as layering, crumpling, and molding to create intricate textures on a canvas.

Reasons to attend-
1. We bring art as the medium to break the ice and meet like-minded people who crave genuine conversations just like you.
2. Unleash Your Inner Child – remember those art class days. It`s time to relive that carefree spirit and let your creativity run wild!
3. Facing a creative block - Clear the brain fog and let your imagination go wild.
4. Need a break from your 9 to 5 Job - Escape the daily grind and give yourself the treat you deserve.
5. Immerse in a therapeutic day with colors. Beginner Friendly
